item.title: When i use a item on a object it dosent work
item.dc:creator: @Mackrack360_Racer_D Mackrack360 + Racer D
item.description:
@Mackrack360_Racer_D wrote:

My friend told me to add this in and change the numbers.

else if (useItemID == BONEKEYID && atObjectID == ANOTHERCHESTID) { deleteItem(BONEKEYID,getItemSlot(BONEKEYID), 1); addItem(CRYSTALKEYID, 1); }

So i made it look like

else if (useItemID == 605 && atObjectID == 4123) { deleteItem(605,getItemSlot(605), 1); sendMessage("You use the bone key on the skeletons chest..."); sendMessage("The bone key dissapears and you pick up the crystal key!"); addItem(989, 1); } }

What i was hoping would work was when i use the bone key on the corpse i would get a crystal key, why wont it work?

Read full topic
item.source: When i use a item on a object it dosent work
